creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: We have heard a lot about essential work in recent months. But the events of the last few days brought into focus the true meaning of these words. The time for essential work of eradicating racism is now. Black Lives Matter.
title: May 31, 2020: ESSENTIAL WORK (BLM)
